p.codeblock: public abstract int updateRtmpTranscodingEx( LiveTranscoding transcoding, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int updateRtmpTranscodingEx(const LiveTranscoding& transcoding, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int UpdateRtmpTranscodingEx(LiveTranscoding transcoding, RtcConnection connection);

section.title: Details
section.p: Agora recommends that you use the server-side Media Push function. For details, see Use RESTful API.

After you start pushing media streams to CDN with transcoding, you can dynamically update the transcoding configuration according to the scenario. The SDK triggers the callback after the transcoding configuration is updated.
